column5: well just found out that i will be heading up north (kirkland lake) for the lake trout opener for 2 weeks i will be leaving wednesday night and plan on targetting lakers,pike and pickeral i will be solo so i am hoping to get into some decent fish i will try to take as many pictures as i can and post them when i get back so wish me luck

right on man..  ...got any room for me ,can i tag along???lol...lol good luck and i hope you catch some real nice lakers and some shore lunch walleyes.  ..and ya take lots of pics so we can check them all out when ya get back cheers
Sounds awesome!!! Good luck and cant wait to see your reports and pics!
That should be a successful fishing trip. Really looking forward to your report upon your return.

FinS........ Awesome trip indeed thar bud! Fishing with family........ Fishing with fellow OFC'rs...... Fishing with friends.........All awesome... some times the best fishing is done alone though.........no distractions, complete concentration.......having an extra is a neccessity at times(net man, boat navigator, safety in pairs etc...) What is it that M.Thorpe says...'Leave your smiles on shore'..and Lew once said...'Only thing I want to hear from a boat partner is...Get The Net' But fishing alone is one of my favs.... Fishing anytime is great.. Looking forward to your report... Be safe and best of luck to you. Peter
best of luck up there, im sure the fishing will be good, and the country is beautiful.

May the fishing gods smile upon you and fill your little white bucket.  May the camera gods smile upon you with perfect batteries and an abundance of room on the card for pictures.   Oh yeah ... good luck !!!
i dont plan on filling up my bucket  i am hoping to catch the fish that got away  Fishermans prayer  May the good lord help me see the day when I catch the one that got away
too bad for all the luck all the luck i got was a blown radiator damn ford so the trip got cancelled hopefully i can get up there before the closing date if not Lake St Clair is calling me
Hey wait a minute .... I didn't wish that on you.  I've had nothing but good wishes for ya.   Sorry to hear about that.  When one door closes ... another one opens up.
